org.spongepowered.api.service.sql

Interface SqlService


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface SqlService
    This service provides the basics for an abstraction over SQL connections.

    Implementations of this service are expected to be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getConnectionUrlFromAlias(java.lang.String alias)
      Returns a possible connection URL for a given alias.
      javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource(java.lang.String jdbcConnection)
      Returns a data source for the provided JDBC connection string or an alias

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSource

        javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource(java.lang.String jdbcConnection)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a data source for the provided JDBC connection string or an alias

        A jdbc connection url is expected to be of the form: jdbc:<engine>://[<username>[:<password>]@]<host>/<database> or an alias (available aliases are known only by the service provider)

        Parameters:
        jdbcConnection - The jdbc url or connection alias
        Returns:
        A data source providing connections to the given URL.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a connection to the given database could not be established

      • getConnectionUrlFromAlias

        com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getConnectionUrlFromAlias(java.lang.String alias)
        Returns a possible connection URL for a given alias.
        Parameters:
        alias - The alias to check
        Returns:
        The connection url as a String if it exists, or Optional.absent()
